segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I need to check-in for the eleven 20 flight to New York , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like a window or an aisle seat , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want an aisle seat as close to the exit door as possible , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . Do you have any bags to check ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I just have this one small bag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are , seat 12c . Please go to gate 23 after passing through the security checkpoint .
segments.speaker: S1
